body:
I'm gonna type this quick, I am using my Windows 2000 computer (Not VM).

Well. My gaming equipment BROKE. One day, I went up to switch It on, the whole thing is split open.

Also, a few days ago I was in a MASSIVE accident and my iPhone 5C smashed to smithereens... I am soon getting a new one -.-

GOOD NEWS:

I am buying better equipment, I'm selling junk on eBay, to also make better news, I am selling my dad's old van (He does not need it) and I am willing to sell it for £10,000 or more. The money is all for me, rest of it is going to family.

I'm gonna be using my friends laptop to sell eBay junk.

-thanks.

I'll reply later, on my Tablet, its out of battery.

title: Why have I been offline?

replies.body: Aw man, that sucks. Hopefully you're new equipment is better (and more durable) than the last! :D
replies.body_tagged: Aw man, that sucks. Hopefully you're new equipment is better (and more durable) than the last! :D
